about.value: Software architect with over 6 years of experience specializing in C++ (11-17), Linux, git, Docker, and CMake. Experienced in system and detailed design, software development, and ASPICE implementation for automotive clients including Daimler AG, Volkswagen AG, and Ceer Motors.
